name: (Title WIP) Monster Adventurer
description:
This is a Dungeon crawling game where you play as an alchemist who lives in a town plagued with monsters. The rest of the story will be written at another time.

Controls:

  • Move with WASD or Arrow Keys.
  • Left Click to attack.
  • Kill all the enemies in every room to open the passage to the next floor.

The game will receive updates as often as I can.
